Reviews.Title: good one
Reviews.Author: Pablo Cesar Garcia
Reviews.Content: I got this mid-december from amazon, here are my thoughts:this is the europe version, so you wont be able to connect it using 3G, the US version is the rw800aPROSnice screen (4")gingerbread pre-installedupgradable to 4.0 (ICS) on mid 2012gaming pad is nicecamera is greatCONSsize (with the covers its even bigger)internal memory is a joke (500MB)laggy with some games"joysticks" are difficult to usemy biggest concern: the build on the phone isnt great, you can feel how there isnt a solid union between both plates (screen and gamepad) this feels VERY fragile and even cheap

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: Daryl Dela Cruz
Reviews.Content: This is one device that's up to date as far as technology is concerned.. I bought some cell phones last year for the same amount but the features does not compare to this one.. this plays old ps1 and ps2 games. i'm amazed by how fast it loads..most of my friends think that i have a psp mobile.. i always tell them it's just my cellphone.. if ur a gamer.. this should be a collection.. i love this phone.. especialy the sound.. it feels like i'm using a bose head phone everytime i use it's head phone to watch a movie or a music.. definitely worth more than what's its worth.. it's a great value product.. and i got it way earlier than expected.. thanks for the fast shipping :)

Reviews.Title: A phone for true gamers!
Reviews.Author: Ranze
Reviews.Content: Love this phone! The fact that it has its dedicated controller is a step up compared to most smart phones that just tries to imitate the iPhone.It's really good to play those old school games using an emulator on this phone... I was able to relieve my childhood again! Haha! I was playingold school contra, castlevania, megaman (rockman), life force, gradius, jackal, etc. Graphics is excellent, OS is fast and snappy, browsing websitesis a breeze as long as you have a fast connection. So many apps in the Android Marketplace that is free to download!If you like gaming like me... I highly recommend this phone and this seller "Justbuydeals" You won't be disappointed!This phone will instantly get rid of your boredom! lolP.S.I got this phone lower than what it is priced now here from this seller. But he ships it very fast and the phone arrivedin excellent condition!

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: maiker dagand
Reviews.Content: exelente compra, el producto llego rapido y en perfectas condiciones! lo recomiendo 100 % espero poder comprar productos de este vendedor

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Gemmo Parker
Reviews.Content: works well play great games......battery life goes fast when playing games call quality clear but not as clear as i wold want to be.a phone you wold love to  have 3g on  but no 3g. If only i had review it further...don't MAKE MY MISTAKE USE THE R800A OVER THE r8ooi  IF YOU ARE In AMERICA an OR you Be VERY SORRY I AM IN THE CARIBBEAN AD WE HAVE 3G AND BUT I AIN'T Getting NO 3G....:( description is very false saying it can work with both an international  but that's a lie.her the info i found..Answer by Sony EricssonHi,The R800a is {made|produced|created} to be {used|utilized|employed|utilised} in North, South and Central America and the R800i is for Europe.-Annieweb link..[...]

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: Hely Barboza
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product, I chose this rating because I think a very functional product, I like it because it has a good resolution, I recommend this product to people of any age

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Robert Cosme "Nosepone"
Reviews.Content: Just what I need! Highly recommend!! Fast! Clear sharp graphics! Perfect size screen! Beautiful design! Would marry it if it was legal!

Reviews.Title: Different option
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: This cell phone its good. Its a different option from the blackberry. At the first moment, its difficult to play... but your expirence chance with the use.

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: excelente producto y de muy buena calidad, entrega inmediata y cien por ciento (100%) garantizado. Espero recibir nuevamente ofertas sobre otros productos de equipos, entre otras.Recomiendo este producto al resto de los clientes.

Reviews.Title: Cool while it worked
Reviews.Author: Enbedded linux
Reviews.Content: Worked for one year and died! Power button SUCKS!!!! Sony you owe us a new Phone! do not buy this junk.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I love the phone it is perfect in every way Im cleaning more about it every day. Love it love it love it!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Bloatware!!!
Reviews.Author: Raed Almulla
Reviews.Content: The phone is decent and I really liked the Built-in Joypad. I have installed few emulators such as ffps from Playstation 1 and it was smoothly running most ps1 games.However, the biggest letdown is the phone memory and bloatware. The phone has a very small internal memory (Close to 380mb) and all apps must be installed in the internal memory first (You could move some apps to the micro SD card later). I run out of memory after one week (eventhough I moved all movable apps to the SD card, which is really a hastle to do so). The phone got really slow aswell.I tried to delete some of the unwanted apps listed below: (that I never used and some were always running on the background)1. Android Live Wallpapers2. Live Wallpapers Catalogue3. Chinese keyboard4. The Sims5. FIFA6. Star Battalion7. News and Weather8. Street View9. Office Suite10. Crash Bandicoot (as playing Playstation games using FPSEis batter)11. Media Server12. Event Thread Block13. Timescape legacy extension wrapper14. Twitter15. Anonymous usage stats (slow down the phone and useless)16. Distributed demo version17. Sony Ericsson sync18. Sync19. Sony Ericsson Sync master client20. Timescape21. Postcard22. Chinese social app (name is in Chinese)23. And even more.All the apps listed above are locked and cannot be removed or stopped unless the phone is rooted (hacked or jailbreaked in iphone terms) and doing this will void the warranty (as per sonyericssons website.I tried to root my device and accidently flashed the wrong image and now my phone is bricked. I hated android and sonyericsson. Yes the phone had some features but the overall experience is nothing compared to the iPhone.
